about_the_game:
Extend your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator!
This DLC contains new equipment of the Lindner brand!
Once downloaded, the additional contents will be available in the shop of the game. Be sure to have sufficient funds to buy the machinery.

Contains the following equipment:
  • Lindner Unitrac 92 – Multipurpose tractor
  • Stöckl Manure Spreader Module
  • Kirchner Slurry tanker Module
  • Lindner Forage wagon Module
  • Lindner Transporter Module

This DLC is compatible with Windows and Mac OS X versions of Farming Simulator 2013® and Farming Simulator 2013® Titanium Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:WINDOWS XP SP3/WINDOWS VISTA SP2/WINDOWS 7
  • Processor:AMD/INTEL 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory:1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics:256 MB OF VIDEO MEMORY ATI RADEON X1600/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600/INTEL HD 2000 OR HIGHER
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Additional:INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION AND THE ONLINE GAME
